column4: hi guys, i am a noob in the linux world. I am just curious on one thing. If i want to update/install a software that has a few dependencies on a PC that doesnt have internet access, how do I go about doing that thru a CD/DVD/USB? is it possible to copy all the necesary files from the repository from another machine?
He's a program.  Not a person.  (Apparently he just passed the turing test!)
